sentences.en: A full - duplex, synchronous communications protocol used in airline reservations systems.
sentences.cn: 一种全双工同步通信协议,用于航空公司定票系统.

sentences.en: A synchronous motor drives the measuring bob at a constant rotational speed.
sentences.cn: 同步马达驱动测锤以恒速旋转.

sentences.en: And the synchronous clock is a key of the synchronization network.
sentences.cn: 而其中同步时钟是同步网的关键.

sentences.en: Comparing with - synchronous motor, the generator has a lot of advantages.
sentences.cn: 与直接驱动的多极数同步电机相比, 这种发电机有很多优点.

sentences.en: Counters can be generally classified as either serial or synchronous.
sentences.cn: 计算器通常可分为串行和同步两类.

sentences.en: For example, you might have a synchronous replica on another machine in the same data center, and an asynchronous replica on a machine in another data center.
sentences.cn: 例如，您可以在同一个数据中心的另一台机器上选择同步复制，而在另一个数据中心的机器上选择异步复制。

sentences.en: In a synchronous procedure, all events take place within a specified period of time.
sentences.cn: 在同步方式中, 所有动作都在特定的期间内产生.

sentences.en: In binary synchronous communication, the use of clock pulses to control synchronization of data and control characters.
sentences.cn: 在二进制位同步通信中，使用时钟脉冲来控制数据和控制字符的同步。

sentences.en: Line - start permanent magnet synchronous machine has high efficiency and power factor.
sentences.cn: 异步起动永磁同步电动机具有较高的功率因数和效率,同时具有异步起动能力.

sentences.en: Polling is a synchronous mechanism, where devices are serviced in sequence.
sentences.cn: 查询是一种同步机构, 其中的各个设备是依次接受服务的.

sentences.en: Since the above inequality is not satisfied a serial - carry synchronous counter can not be used.
sentences.cn: 因上述不等式不能成立,所以不能采用串行进位同步计数器.

sentences.en: Synchronous machines do not easily fall out of step under normal conditions.
sentences.cn: 在正常情况下,同步电机不易失去同步.

sentences.en: The message can be used only with synchronous operations .
sentences.cn: 消息只能与同步操作一起使用。

sentences.en: The pump and drive system with a synchronous AC motors.
sentences.cn: 泵及其驱动编制的安排拔取了同步互换电机.

sentences.en: This type of counter is called a parallel - carry synchronous counter.
sentences.cn: 这种计数器称为并行进位同步计数器.

sentences.en: Traction motor in elevator actually was an AC non - synchronous motor.
sentences.cn: 电梯中的曳引电动机实际上就是一台 交流异步 电动机.

sentences.en: Transitions within states should normally be synchronous, since there is no change of owner.
sentences.cn: 状态间的转换通常应该是同步的，因为所有者没有改变。

sentences.en: Wrinkle conveyor belt speed and main machine speed are Synchronous.
sentences.cn: 皱纹输送皮带、和主机速度同部连线.

words.tran_cn: 同时发生，同步性；对照性历史年谱
[电] 同步装置；同步闪光装置
同步指示器；同步示波器；同期表；同步表
同步检定器；[电子] 同步示波器
[核] 同步加速器；同步回旋加速器
使同时（synchronise的过去式和过去分词）
使协调（synchronize的过去分词）；同时发生；校准
使同步；使同时发生（等于synchronize）

phrases.tran_cn: 同步运行；同步操作；同步作业

trans.tran_cn: 同时存在[发生]的，同步的
trans.tran_en: if two or more things are synchronous, they happen at the same time or work at the same speed
